price: 174. Eh! Bino bato ya sôló bilembetele esila kokomela bino kowuta epai na Nkolo wa bino, mpe tokitisaki epai na bino bongengisi ya polele (mwinda).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَكُم بُرۡهَٰنٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَأَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ نُورٗا مُّبِينٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāakum bur'hānun min rabbikum wa-anzalnā ilaykum nūran mubīnan
